scripts.prod:client: npm run deps:client && npm run build:client
scripts.prod:server: npm run deps:server && npm run build:server
scripts.start:server: npm run prod:server && npm run setup:db && npm --prefix ./server run start:prod
scripts.start:user-service: npm run deps:user-service && npm --prefix ./microservices/user-service run start:prod
scripts.start:logging-service: npm run deps:logging-service && npm --prefix ./microservices/logging-service run start:prod
scripts.start:microservices: npm run start:user-service & npm run start:logging-service
scripts.start:app: npm run prod:client && npm run start:server && npm run start:microservices && npm run start:redis
scripts.setup:db: npm run db:safe-setup && npm run load:demo-data
scripts.stop:redis: docker stop redis-microservices && docker rm redis-microservices
